means: 在什么上面，（关系副词）在那上面

sentence.Network_en: Have you seen the hill whereon a tower is standing?
sentence.Network_cn: 你看到耸立着一座塔的那座小山了 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder ? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
sentence.Network_cn: 天将为那日而破裂, 真主 的应许要实现的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W1)|无忧教育 ... whereof 关于什么 whereon 如何 wheresoever 在其上.
什么-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 关于什么 whereof 在什么上面 whereon 不知什么原因 somehow.
第二章合同   - shenghe_chen的日志 -... ... whereof 关于那事，关于那物 whereon 在那上面；因此，于是 whereto 到……地方，向那里.
whereon 于是, whereon 在什么, whereon 因此

list.abs: i love the ground whereon she stands ., 我热爱她停留的处所.

auth_sentence.content: Whereon each of the others raises objections, backed up with imaginary shock-horror newspaper headlines.

auth_sentence.content: Whereon they all did thumbs-up and "Have a good day".Meg Wilkes is right: admit frailty and hands reach out.

auth_sentence.content: Whereon the lad remained on standby, with two friends, until I got up and clearly was all right.
